mapper.select: select team_id, order_id, original_price, pay_price, discount_deduction, status from user_group_buy_order_detail where out_trade_no = #{outTradeNo} and status = 0

select user_id, team_id, order_id, activity_id, start_time, end_time, goods_id, source, channel, original_price, pay_price, discount_deduction, status, out_trade_no, out_trade_time, biz_id from user_group_buy_order_detail where user_id = #{userId} and activity_id = #{activityId}
mapper.insert: insert into user_group_buy_order_detail(user_id, team_id, order_id, activity_id, start_time, end_time, goods_id, source, channel, original_price, pay_price, discount_deduction, status, out_trade_no, biz_id, create_time, update_time) values (#{userId}, #{teamId}, #{orderId}, #{activityId}, #{startTime}, #{endTime}, #{goodsId}, #{source}, #{channel}, #{originalPrice}, #{payPrice}, #{discountDeduction}, #{status}, #{outTradeNo}, #{bizId}, now(), now())
mapper.update: update user_group_buy_order_detail set status = #{status}, out_trade_time = #{outTradeTime}, update_time = now() where out_trade_no = #{outTradeNo}
